thread.title: Hrithik Roshan:

author: Asha Prakash
title: Hrithik Roshan:
text:
None other than Hrithik Roshan has tweeted about Kunal Kapoor 's upcoming Malayalam film, Veeram. "Woah!!!! This looks INCREDIBLE. What a contrast from that superbly real n romantic dear zindagi performance! Can't wait to watch #Veeram" he tweeted as a response to Kunal's tweet which said, "Spurned in love. Coming for revenge on the 24th of Feb #chanduchekavar @VeeramOfficial."
Veeram is an upcoming Indian epic historical drama film written and directed by Jayaraj. It is an adaptation of William Shakespeare's play, Macbeth, and is the fifth installment in Jayaraj's Navarasa series.
